base.name: StateSpace
base.description: Models a linear system by State Space representation.

parameter_definitions.name: A
parameter_definitions.description: Coefficients of the state space A matrix, which is sort of like a jacobian like this state*A=derivative.

parameter_definitions.name: B
parameter_definitions.description: Coefficients of the state space B matrix, which is the input matrix like this input*B=derivative.

parameter_definitions.name: C
parameter_definitions.description: Coefficients of the state space C matrix, which is the output matrix like state*C=output.

parameter_definitions.name: D
parameter_definitions.description: Coefficients of the state space D matrix, which is feedthrough matrix like this output=D*input.

parameter_definitions.name: initial_states
parameter_definitions.description: initial value of state space system state vector
